E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Urbano Valencia
Dear Sir,
Urbano Valencia shouldn't play at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .191 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
